title: Smart Dataset Creator
description: Use AI technology to automatically generate high-quality training datasets from raw data, supporting multiple dataset types and formats.

qaPairs.name: QA Pairs
qaPairs.description: Generate question-answer pairs from document content, suitable for QA system training
qaPairs.useCase: Smart customer service, knowledge Q&A, educational assistance

instructionTuning.name: Instruction Tuning
instructionTuning.description: Generate instruction-input-output triplets for instruction-following model training
instructionTuning.useCase: Smart office, document processing, personalized assistant

textClassification.name: Text Classification
textClassification.description: Extract document fragments and generate classification labels for sentiment analysis, content moderation, etc.
textClassification.useCase: Sentiment analysis, content moderation, news classification, intent recognition

dialogue.name: Dialogue Tuning
dialogue.description: Generate multi-turn dialogue data to improve dialogue coherence and context understanding
dialogue.useCase: Smart customer service, chatbots, voice assistants

domainAdaptation.name: Domain Adaptation
domainAdaptation.description: Domain-specific knowledge fine-tuning to improve model performance in professional fields
domainAdaptation.useCase: Medical diagnosis, legal consultation, financial analysis

reasoning.name: Reasoning Tuning
reasoning.description: Reasoning data with chain of thought to train model logical reasoning abilities
reasoning.useCase: Math problem solving, code generation, logical reasoning, complex analysis

knowledgeDistillation.name: Knowledge Distillation
knowledgeDistillation.description: Extract knowledge from large models to train smaller models, balancing performance and cost
knowledgeDistillation.useCase: Model compression, edge deployment, cost optimization

alpaca.name: Alpaca Format
alpaca.description: Classic instruction tuning format released by Stanford University, simple structure, suitable for single-turn tasks

shareGPT.name: ShareGPT Format
shareGPT.description: Format supporting multi-turn dialogue and tool calling, closer to real interaction scenarios

openAI.name: OpenAI Format
openAI.description: OpenAI API compatible format, simplified version of ShareGPT

alpacaCOT.name: Alpaca-COT Format
alpacaCOT.description: Alpaca format with chain of thought, suitable for reasoning task training

csv.name: CSV Format
csv.description: Simple table format, suitable for classification and annotation tasks

configModel.name: Configure Model
configModel.description: Configure AI model and processing parameters

step1.title: Select MD Data Files
step1.noMdFiles: No converted MD files in this collection

noCollections.title: No available data collections
noCollections.description: Please create a data collection and upload files in raw data management first
